title: In the event of any proposed road widening, the computation of permissible F
clause_text: In the event of any proposed road widening, the computation of permissible F.S.I. shall be made on gross plot area without deducting the area under such proposed road widening and the height of a building shall be relaxed by the C.E.O., S.R.A. on the merits of each case for such road area going under road widening as per the Development Control Regulations of the concerned Municipal Corporation.
section: The Minimum Tenement Density to be achieved in S.R.S. :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
